s1.subtitle: JMS related pages and documentation

ul.li: IBM developerWork article introducing JMS: "Enterprise messaging with JMS"
IBM developerWork article about administration and naming: "Implementing vendor-independent JMS solutions"
IBM developerWork article about JMS 1.1: "JMS 1.1 simplifies messaging with unified domains"

s1.subtitle: J2ME related site
ScalAgent Distributed Technologies
s1.p: ScalAgent is the provider of the open-source platform on top of which JORAM's MOM is built.

s1.name: Softwares
s1.p: The following software components are involved in the JORAM platform:

ul.li:
JavaCup is a Java parser generator used in the message selection feature. It is covered by the
CUP Parser Generator Copyright Notice, License, and Disclaimer.
kXML is an XML parser for J2ME used by kJORAM for communicating with the JORAM platform. It is covered by the Enhydra Public License.
Regexp is a regular expression parser used in the message selection feature. It is covered by the Apache license.
SOAP is an implementation of the SOAP protocol used by the SOAP proxy. It is covered by the Apache license.
Xerces is an XML parser used for platform configuration. It is is covered by the Apache license.
